items.sentence: It's a pity that you weren't able to do that.
Tom said he was glad that Mary had done that.
Tom said he was glad that you didn't do that.
Tom said that he isn't sure Mary can do that.
Tom said that he had not intended to do that.
Tom said he isn't sure that Mary can do that.
Tom said he didn't believe that you did that.
Tom said that doing that was never an option.
Tom said that doing that wouldn't be any fun.
Tom said that everybody he knows can do that.
